title: LAKIN'S LAIR
paragraphs: Fred Lakin, a well known member of the Hobart Walking Club, had an eponymous sandstone shelter near Junction Cabin.  Although it was an open shelter, a chimney was built in its side.  Unfortunately, the chimney collapsed in the 1990s.
The shelter is also known as Balfe’s Burrow and Wellington’s Hut.

images.alt: Maria Grist lights up Lakins Lair 1991
